Articles.Content:
What is this, a strategies for ants?

Don't mind Toolbar - this issue isn't mod-related.

Actually, this is hardly a bug, just a small (literally) overlook.
On my screen (2560x1440) this looks completely normal, what's the issue?
I think there is a UI resize slider in the settings menu if it is too small.

On my screen (2560x1440) this looks completely normal, what's the issue?

Are you running KSP in 2560x1440? Can you post a screenshot?

I think there is a UI resize slider in the settings menu if it is too small.

It resizes only flight UI, not space center facilities UIs.

I think (hope) they'll add more strategies later on, perhaps some more complex ones that involve launch costs and certain parts or experiments. But for now, the current ones are usually enough, even if it does look underwhelming.
